#summary Super RTS G7

= Introduction =

The G7 Super RTS is currently in development.

As of now (2/2/09), maps load sucessfully, the editor for them is complete (and expandable), and the game runs correctly.

The only remaining thing to do is correct the resource system.

= Units =

Worker: basic unit, gathers resources

= Buildings =

HQ: builds workers, resources can be returned to it

= Resources =

So far resources include: trees

Resources must be brought back to an HQ before they can be used.
